paper_abstract: In this paper we deal with the periodic nature and the form of the solutions of the following systems of rational difference equations x(n+1) = x(n-3)/+/- 1 +/- x(n-3)y(n-1), y(n+1) = y(n-3)/+/- 1 +/- y(n-3)x(n-1) with a nonzero real number's initial conditions. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the solutions of systems of rational difference equations
